name: TIPO Token
description: Tangled is a live video chat platform where users are rewarded with the crypto currency TIPO token for their social activities. All social applications are designed in such a way that users must purchase in-app products in order to have a fluid user experience. In these social applications, all of the earnings from such interactions flow to one centralized entity, while the users who generate much of the value within such apps go unrewarded. By introducing blockchain technology and tokenization of the social experiences, Tangled will actually allow users to earn crypto by communicating with our application.
